entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 9.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Thursday 27 April 2023
